DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History Body Mass Index Finding Float
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The result of a body mass index measurement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History Body Mass Index Finding
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._The result of a body mass index measurement.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.
